entities.name: Fax
entities.description: Activity that tracks call outcome and number of pages for a fax and optionally stores an electronic copy of the document.

attributes.name: regardingObjectId
attributes.description: Choose the record that the fax relates to.

attributes.name: scheduledDurationMinutes
attributes.description: Shows the expected duration of the fax activity, in minutes.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the fax activity.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: coverPageName
attributes.description: Type the name of the cover page to use when sending the fax.

attributes.name: billingCode
attributes.description: Type the billing code for the fax to make sure the fax is charged to the correct sender or customer account.

attributes.name: actualDurationMinutes
attributes.description: Type the number of minutes spent creating and sending the fax. The duration is used in reporting.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the fax activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled fax activities are read-only and can't be edited.

attributes.name: numberOfPages
attributes.description: Type the number of pages included in the fax.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the fax, such as the primary message or the products and services featured.

attributes.name: scheduledEnd
attributes.description: Enter the expected due date and time.

attributes.name: faxNumber
attributes.description: Type the recipient's fax number.

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, queue, or user recipients for the fax.

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: Type a category to identify the fax type, such as sales offer or press release, to tie the fax to a business group or function.

attributes.name: actualStart
attributes.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the fax. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was created, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the fax.

attributes.name: tsid
attributes.description: Type the Transmitting Subscriber ID (TSID) associated with a send action. This is typically a combination of the recipient's fax or phone number and company name.

attributes.name: isWorkflowCreated
attributes.description: Indication of whether the fax activity was created by a workflow rule.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the fax.

attributes.name: actualEnd
attributes.description: Enter the actual end date and time of the fax. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was completed or canceled, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the fax.

attributes.name: directionCode
attributes.description: Select the direction of the fax as incoming or outbound.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: scheduledStart
attributes.description: Enter the expected due date and time.

attributes.name: from
attributes.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, queue, or user who sent the fax.

attributes.name: activityId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the fax activity.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the fax's status.

attributes.name: subject
attributes.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the fax.

attributes.name: priorityCode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: subcategory
attributes.description: Type a subcategory to identify the fax type to relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

attributes.name: isBilled
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the fax activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user that owns the fax activity.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: activityTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of activity.

attributes.name: isRegularActivity
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team that owns the fax activity.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: SLAId
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the fax record.

attributes.name: SLAInvokedId
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this fax. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onHoldTime
attributes.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

attributes.name: lastOnHoldTime
attributes.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: sortDate
attributes.description: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

attributes.name: serviceId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for an associated service.
